channel.title: Modding Halo 2!
channel.description:
Here are two topics of how to mod halo 2 plus a special map pack.
[url=http://www.se7ensins.com/forums/ftp-networking-tutorials/86-get-halo2-maps-off-your-hdd-mod-them.html]Get The Halo 2 Maps off your Xbox Harddrive to Mod them[/url]
[url=http://www.se7ensins.com/forums/halo-2-beginners-tutorials/24-modding-halo-2-beginners-pics.html]Modding Halo 2 Beginner with Pictures[/url]
[url=http://rapidshare.de/files/34208535/D0NTTCARES_MAPAPCK_s__SPECIAL_EDITION.zip.html]Dontcares Map Pack[/url]
For the Map Pack You need to Follow this guide.
[url=http://files.halomods.com/viewtopic.php?t=60216&sid=9390d50d2a405d77d685746c4ea78bfc]SPPF[/url]
[url=http://rapidshare.de/files/4317494/cmr.zip.html]You need this to resign the Map for new encryption[/url]
[url=http://files.halomods.com/download.php?id=48948]This is to patch the map[/url] To use Sppf Program Open The Map you wish to mod ( Note to self Make 2 back up of Halo 2 Maps) Open the Map Should be in your Folder Open the Map Look for the sppf in the Dontrcare map pack and Open it Press Apply It should take some time, after its done go back to the map you just modded should be .map in your directory then Open Cmr2 and Open map open it then click resign map it should be easy and new FTP back to your xbox.
Here are two more great Tutorials
[url=http://www.productwiki.com/microsoft_xbox/article/how_to_go_from_xbox_to_xbox_media_center_in_30_minutes.html]Xbox to Xbox Media Center in 30 Minutes[/url]
[url=http://forums.afterdawn.com/thread_view.cfm/376141]Make XBMC Default Dashboard[/url]

item.title: Modding Halo 2!
item.dc:creator: @afi afi
item.description:
@afi wrote:

Here are two topics of how to mod halo 2 plus a special map pack.

Get The Halo 2 Maps off your Xbox Harddrive to Mod them

Modding Halo 2 Beginner with Pictures

Dontcares Map Pack

For the Map Pack You need to Follow this guide.

SPPF

You need this to resign the Map for new encryption

This is to patch the map
To use Sppf Program
Open The Map you wish to mod ( Note to self Make 2 back up of Halo 2 Maps)
Open the Map Should be in your Folder Open the Map
Look for the sppf in the Dontrcare map pack and Open it
Press Apply It should take some time,
after its done go back to the map you just modded
should be .map in your directory
then Open Cmr2 and Open map open it then click resign map it should be easy and new FTP back to your xbox.

Here are two more great Tutorials

Xbox to Xbox Media Center in 30 Minutes

Make XBMC Default Dashboard

Read full topic
